stimulusHtml: Demands for labor like that depicted in the image explains which of the following related effects?

features.html:
“Secretaries, housewives, waitresses, women from all over central Florida are getting into vocational schools to learn war work. Typical are these in the Daytona Beach branch of the Volusia County vocational school.” Office of War Information, 1942.

Courtesy of the National Archives

choicesHtml: The economy declined because too much labor was being devoted to wartime industries.
Immigrant laborers began leaving the United States because they could not find work in wartime industries.
Men and women migrated from rural areas to cities in order to work in defense industries.
Industrialists advocated for expanding United States colonial holdings to obtain more labor resources.
